viewData.name: Samsung MU8000 55" Class HDR UHD Smart LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung MU8000 55" Class HDR UHD Smart LED TV featuring UHD 3840 x 2160 LED Panel, HDR10 Support Motion Rate 240 for Reduced Motion Blur. Review Samsung MU8000
viewData.long_description: View content at four times the resolution of 1080p with the Samsung MU8000 55" Class HDR UHD Smart LED TV. This TV has a 54.5" LED-backlit LCD display, and incorporates Motion Rate 240 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. The MU8000 has built-in Wi-Fi connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content via the Samsung Smart Hub, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. It includes a One Connect Mini, which houses all the TV's wired connectivity, and connects to the TV with one cable to allow for discreet installation. With four HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. Three USB ports are also onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
